data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 121,854 who are far from you in Islands, Hong Kong from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Islands, Hong Kong
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Islands, Hong Kong know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 16 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Islands who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 8,581 believers in the state of Islands.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Islands, Hong Kong a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Islands prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Islands to exponentially multiply disciples.

data.section_summary:
the state of Islands, Hong Kong has a population of 140,200.

We estimate Islands has 8,581 people who might know Jesus, 9,765 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 121,854 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 16 neighbors who need Jesus.
